articles.title: Masondo proposes R146bn in govt debt be forgiven - in exchange for climate targets - News24
articles.description: David Masondo, South Africa’s deputy finance minister, suggested that investors forgive about R146 billion of sovereign debt in exchange for the national power utility meeting climate targets.
